item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: library(readr) Life_Expectancy_Data <- read_csv("~/Life Expectancy Data.csv") ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## .default = col_double(), ## Country = col_character(), ## Status = col_character() ## ) ## See spec(...) for full column specifications.
